name: Bean Stalker
storyline:
The tree branches reach up to the sky, and the beanstalk provides a link between Earth and the Upper world. Every continent and every climate started to rise from the underworld. An endless horde of creatures descending from the sky and crawling out from the deep below. You need to hunt creatures and adapt to a new way of vertical life. Be the Stalker of this New Realm. Use your Blade Slammer, and become more than a new hunter of this new world.
Evolve, create, develop to be the most skilled among all, and defeat the soul of the tree on top.
summary: Be the stalker of this new realm. Explorative, random world challenges in the setting of an exciting vertical world of beanstalks. With the Blade Slammer become more than a new hunter. Hunt creatures and adapt to a new way of vertical life. Evolve, create, develop to be the most skilled among all.
